segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so unstable, I'm scared for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be encouraging him, her eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water flowing over the sink, creating a little waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn't see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get away with taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt in this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in so much light, it's a beautiful day outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a mix of calm and chaos, it's quite fascinating.
segments.speaker: PAR
